Very Cute Blond trying to get a cab on 7th Ave. - m4w (West Village)

7th avenue at west 12th street

(google map) (yahoo map)

body : curvy height : 5'4" (162cm) status : single

On Monday, 10/21 around dusk, you were on 7th ave between West 12th and Greenwich on the west side of the street opposite what was once St. Vincents Hospital, trying to get a cab, you a very cute blond, We made eye contact as I rode by on my red spyder motorcycle which you dont see many of in NY. I thought of turning around to give you a lift to where you were headed but had to be someplace. Would still like to offer you that ride. If you see this contact me so we can meet up for that ride!
